[event]
# Stairs Down
type=event
location=15,15,3,3
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/iron_labyrinth_f3.txt
set_status=emp_il_f3
soundfx=soundfx/environment/stairs.ogg,0,0
tooltip=Iron Labyrinth: Level 3
unset_status=emp_il_f2

[event]
# Spawn point: Stairs down
type=event
location=13,16,1,1
intermap_id=stairs_down

[enemy]
type=enemy
